field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #MESSAGE_ID# - the message ID #USER_ID# - the request recipient ID #USER_NAME# - the request recipient first name #USER_LAST_NAME# - the request recipient last name #SENDER_ID# - the request sender ID #SENDER_NAME# - the request sender first name #SENDER_LAST_NAME# - the request sender last name #TITLE# - the message title #MESSAGE# - the message body #EMAIL_TO# - the message recipient's e-mail
